p: This was an analytical performance evaluation of the Elecsys 速 Zika IgG assay using the cobas e 601 platform. The performance of the Elecsys 速 Zika IgG assay was compared with that of the anti-Zika virus ELISA IgG (EUROIMMUN, L端beck, Germany) [ 18]. Testing of the Elecsys 速 Zika IgG was performed at TRIGA-S Scientific Solutions, Habach, Germany. All other testing was performed at Roche Diagnostics GmbH (Penzberg, Germany).
